attributes.action: invite the police to investigate and prosecute all MP's found to have made false claims and exploited the system of parliamentary allowances to subsidise their lifestyles and multiple homes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The goverment needs to prove that it can be trusted and our MP's are not in the position to "feather thier own nest".  As it is in British law ignorance is not a defence therefor it is a police matter to decide if any case of theft of public money has happened.

rejection.details: The PM cannot instruct the police and CPS in this way.  Anyone can refer a matter to the police for investigation and they have the discretion whether to investigate the matter or not.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
